entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 5.0.2
entry.content:
Fixed 2FA for login screen if enabled.

What's Changed

  • Z211 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/102

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/5.0.1...5.0.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 5.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Lidarr now works

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 5.3.0
entry.content:
Includes Whisparr support and New Dashboard

What's Changed

  • Wh07 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/5.2.0...5.3.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 5.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Only require 10 char password (no other requirements)

  • Readarr now respects user value for API timeout

  • 5.3.1 Updates by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/137 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/5.3.0...5.3.1
